original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sattayā madhyatas bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā vivikta tayā madhyatas bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā svabhāva tayā madhyatas bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyām
analyzed: na hi āyuṣmam chāradvatīputra abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sattāyām abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā a śūnyatāyām

original: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate
analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā vivikta tāyām abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā svabhāva tāyām pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate

original: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
analyzed: na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate na ca anya abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sattā anya abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā śūnyatā anya abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā viviktatā anya abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā svabhāva tā anyaḥ

original: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ nyaḥ pūrva antaḥ para antaḥ madhyam iti hi āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra

original: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā
analyzed: yā ca abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā asattā yā ca abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā aśūnyatā yā ca abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā avivikta tā

original: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto

original: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: smṛti upasthāna asvabhāva tayā apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

analyzed: samyak prahāṇa asvabhāva tayā apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: ārūpyasamāpattiviviktatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: ārūpya samāpatti vivikta tayā apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: ārūpya samāpatti asvabhāva tayā apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: ārūpyasamāpattiviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,

analyzed: bhāva śūnyatā bhāva śūnyatayā śūnyā tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā śūnyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra smṛti upasthānāni smṛti upasthānaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām samyak prahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhipādāḥ ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām samyak prahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ indriyāṇi indriyaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām indriyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām ārya aṣṭa aṅgaḥ mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ ārya satyāni ārya satyaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ āryasatyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām ārya satyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ apramāṇāni apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. aṣṭau vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām ārūpya samāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattaya nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya

analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām dhāraṇī mukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ tathāgata balāni tathāgata balaiḥ śūnyāni tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām vaiśāradyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

analyzed: prajñāpāramitā bodhisattve na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman chāradvatī putra evam vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta punar bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta rūpam iti vedanā iti saṃjñā iti saṃskārāḥ iti vijñānam iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta cakṣuḥ iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihvā iti kāyaḥ iti manaḥ iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na tat cakṣuḥ na śrotram na tat ghrāṇam na sā jihvā na sa kāyaḥ na tat manaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta rūpam iti śabdaḥ iti gandhaḥ iti rasaḥ iti sparśaḥ iti dharmāḥ iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na tat rūpam na sa śabdaḥ na gandhaḥ na sa rasaḥ na sa sparśaḥ na te dharmāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti  #
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta cakṣuḥ vijñām iti śrotra vijñānam iti ghrāṇa vijñānam iti jihvā vijñānam iti

original: kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
analyzed: kāya vijñānam iti manaḥ vijñānam iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam.  #
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na tat cakṣuḥ vijñānam na tat śrotra vijñānam na tat ghrāṇa vijñānam na tat jihvā vijñānam na tat kāya vijñānam na tat manaḥ vijñānam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ iti śrotra saṃsparśaḥ iti ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ iti jihvā saṃsparśaḥ

original: iti kāyasaṃsparśa iti manaḥsaṃsparśa iti,
analyzed: iti kāya saṃsparśaḥ iti manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.  #
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na sa cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ na sa śrotra saṃsparśaḥ na ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ na sa jihvā saṃsparśaḥ na sa kāya saṃsparśaḥ na sa manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti

original: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
analyzed: śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti

original: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti,
analyzed: kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na sā cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā na sā śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā

original: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
analyzed: na sā ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā na sā jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā na sā kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā

original: na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na sā manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāmam tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur  #
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta pṛthivī dhātuḥ iti ap dhātuḥ iti tejaḥ dhātuḥ iti vāyu dhātuḥ iti ākāśa dhātuḥ

original: iti vijñānadhātur iti,
analyzed: iti vijñāna dhātuḥ iti

original: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. tat kasya
analyzed: yat ca nāmadheya mātram na sa pṛthivī dhātuḥ na saḥ u dhātuḥ na sa tejaḥ dhātuḥ na sa vāyu dhātuḥ na saḥ ākāśa dhātuḥ na sa vijñāna dhātuḥ tat kasya

original: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: tathā hi nāma śūnyam nāma svabhāvena yat ca śūnyam na tat nāma tena kāraṇena ucyate nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta avidyā iti saṃskārāḥ

analyzed: iti vijñānam iti nāma rūpam iti ṣaṣ āyatanam iti sparśam iti vedanā iti tṛṣṇā iti upādānam

original: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
analyzed: iti bhavaḥ iti jātiḥ iti jarā maraṇam iti

original: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacid tiṣṭhati

original: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ

original: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo

analyzed: tasmāt namadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

analyzed: āgantukam etat āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta sarvajña tā iti na ca sarvajña tāyām nāma na ca nāmni sarvajña tā tat kasya

original: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.

analyzed: yāni an abhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni

analyzed: yāni an abhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni

original: yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
analyzed: yāni an abhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni daśa tathāgata balāni

analyzed: vaiśāradyāni

analyzed: yā an abhisaṃskṛtā na sā mahā maitrī

analyzed: ye na abhisaṃskṛtāḥ na te ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

analyzed: yā an abhisaṃskṛtā na sā sarvajña tā

analyzed: yā an abhisaṃskṛtā na sā mārga ākāra jña tā

analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāradvatīputra evam āha

original: kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena evam vadasi

original: tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
analyzed: tat kim an abhinirvṛttam prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmi iti

original: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra yā an abhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā

original: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: sā an abhinirvṛttiḥ iti hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca prajñāpāramitā ca abhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: anena āyuṣman chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa evam vadasi

original: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
analyzed: tat kim an abhinirvṛttim prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāradvatīputra evam āha

original: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti. tathā
analyzed: kena kāraṇena na anyatra abhivṛttyā bodhisattvaḥ upalabhyate yaḥ bodhāya caret iti tathā

original: hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam
analyzed: hi āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na anyam

original: anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati. iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś
analyzed: an abhinirvṛttim anyam bodhisattvam samanupaśyati iti hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ

original: cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā rūpam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca rūpam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃjñā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca saṃjñā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca saṃskārāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāś cakṣuḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ cakṣuḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatranabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotraṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca cakṣuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotram samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotraṃ (ŚsP_II-1_158)
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca śrotram

original: cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca ghrāṇam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā jihvām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca jihvā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca kāyaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca manaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā rūpam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca rūpam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śabdaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā gandhaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca śabdaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā gandham samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca gandhaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rasaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca gandhaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ rasam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rasaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca rasaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca sparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca dharmāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāś cakṣurvijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ cakṣuḥ vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinivṛttiḥ ca cakṣuḥ vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotra vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravṇñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinivṛttiḥ ca śrotra vṇñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: śrotravijñānam. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: śrotra vijñānam na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇa vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāvijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca ghrāṇa vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛttyā jihvā vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyavyñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca jihvā vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāya vyñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv o advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manovijñānaṃ samanunpaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca kāya vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau o advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛttyā manaḥ vijñānam

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca manaḥ vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ cakṣuḥ saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam (ŚsP_II-1_159)
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam

original: advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotra saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca śrotra saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇa saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛttyā jihvā saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca jihvā saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāya saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca kāya saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā manaḥ saṃsparśam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ pṛthivīdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ pṛthivī dhātum samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca pṛthivīdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca pṛthivī dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ ap dhātum samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tejodhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca ap dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ tejaḥ dhātum samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tejodhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vāyudhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca tejaḥ dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ vāyu dhātum samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vāyudhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkārm. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ākāśadhātuṃ (ŚsP_II-1_160)
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca vāyu dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkārm na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ ākāśa dhātum

original: samanupaśyati,
analyzed: samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ākāśadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca ākāśa dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ vijñāna dhātum samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca vijñāna dhātuḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter avidyāṃ samanupaśyati,

analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca avidyā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca saṃskārāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ vijñānam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter nāmarūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca vijñānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ nāma rūpam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca nāmarūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca nāma rūpam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ ṣaṣ āyatanam samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vedanāṃ samanupaśyati,

analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca upādānam ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ bhavam samanupaśyati

analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca dāna pāramitā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ śīla pāramitām samanupaśyati

analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca śīla pāramitā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ kṣānti pāramitām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ paramārthaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca mahāśūnyatā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ paramārtha śūnyatām samanupaśyati

analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca saṃskṛta śūnyatā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ asaṃskṛta śūnyatām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samyakprahāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ṛddhipādān samanupaśyati,

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca apramāṇāni ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cārūpyasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca ārūpya samāpattiḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ aṣṭau vimokṣām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭau vimokṣāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattīḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ (ŚsP_II-1_163)
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca nava anupūrva vihāra samāpattiḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni samanupaśyati,
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukhāni samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhijñāḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca apramāṇāni ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ abhijñāḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhijñāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samādhīn samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca abhijñāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ samādhīn samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samādhayaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca samādhayaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ dhāraṇī mukhāni samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhāraṇīmukhāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter daśatathāgatabalāni samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ daśa tathāgata balāni samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca daśatathāgatabalāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catvāri vaiśāradyāni samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca daśa tathāgata balāni ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ catvāri vaiśāradyāni samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāmaitrīṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ mahā maitrīm samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāmaitrī cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahākaruṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca mahāmaitrī ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ mahā karuṇām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahākaruṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca mahā karuṇā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi anabhinirvṛttiḥ ca aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra anabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvajña tām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mārgākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca sarvajña tā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ mārga ākāra jña tām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mārgākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca mārga ākāra jña tā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram na anyatra an abhinirvṛtteḥ sarva ākāra jña tām samanupaśyati

original: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhinirvṛttiḥ ca sarva ākāra jña tā ca ubhau etau dharmau advayam a dvaidhīkāram

original: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
analyzed: anena āyuṣmam chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa na anyatra anabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattvaḥ upalabhyate yaḥ bodhāya caret

original: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāradvatī putra evam āha kena kāraṇena evam vadasi

original: sacet bodhisatto mahāsattva evam uddiśyamānenotrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
analyzed: saced bodhisattaḥ mahāsattvaḥ evam na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam

original: āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
analyzed: āpadyate carati bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām tathā hi āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra

original: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (ŚsP_II-1_164)
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. svapnopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
analyzed: nirīhakāt sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati svapna upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati

original: māyopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. mārīcyupamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
analyzed: māyā upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati mārīci upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati

original: pratiśrutkopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratibhāsopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
analyzed: pratiśrutkā upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati pratibhāsa upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati

original: nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
analyzed: nirmita upamān sarva dharmān na samanupaśyati

original: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: anena āyuṣmam chāradvatī putra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam nirdeśam śrutvā na utrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyām

original: athāyuṣman subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha āyuṣman subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye rūpam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedaneyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye vedanām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedanā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye saṃjñāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñeyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye saṃjñām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye saṃskārān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārā ima iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye saṃskārān na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārāḥ ime iti

original: tasmin samaye vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etad iti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣur etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥ na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥ etat iti

original: tasmin samaye śrotraṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye śrotram na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etat iti

original: tasmin samaye ghrāṇaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye ghrāṇam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye jihvāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihveyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye jihvām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye kāyaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye kāyam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye mano nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mana etad iti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye manaḥ na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥ etat iti

original: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye rūpam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye śabdaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye śabdam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye gandhaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandho 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye gandham na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandhaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye rasaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati (ŚsP_II-1_165)
analyzed: tasmin samaye rasam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati

original: nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati raso 'yam iti,
analyzed: na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rasaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye sparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sparśao 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye sparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati yam iti

original: tasmin samaye dharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmā ima iti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye dharmān na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmāḥ ime iti

original: tasmin samaye cakṣurvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣurvijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥ vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥ vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye śrotravijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotravijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye śrotra vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotra vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye ghrāṇavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇavijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye ghrāṇa vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇa vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye jihvāvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāvijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye jihvā vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvā vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye kāyavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyavijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye kāya vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāya vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manovijñānam etad iti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye manaḥ vijñānam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥ vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥ saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye śrotra saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotra saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye ghrāṇa saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye jihvā saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvā saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye kāya saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāya saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye manaḥ saṃsparśam na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
analyzed: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iyam

original: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
analyzed: tasmin samaye śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iyam

original: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam
analyzed: tasmin samaye ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iyam

original: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanām na upaiti na upādatte na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedanā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_166)
